overview: Guide for using call script templates

template_selection.retention: Use for HCPs with declining IBSA share (660 identified in EDA)
template_selection.growth: Use for high-volume HCPs with low IBSA share (264 identified)
template_selection.optimization: Use for HCPs receiving samples with low ROI (48.5% of HCPs)
template_selection.introduction: Use for new HCPs or first-time calls

dynamic_slot_filling.description: Replace placeholder slots with actual HCP data

compliance_integration.approved_content: Always use approved content from compliance library (Phase 6B)
compliance_integration.required_disclaimers: Include all relevant disclaimers at end of script
compliance_integration.approval_tracking: Log content used for audit trail

personalization_options.manual: Rep manually fills slots with HCP data
personalization_options.semi_automated: CRM system pre-fills known data fields
personalization_options.fully_automated: RAG + GPT-4 system generates complete script (Phase 6D)
